bill.title: Relating To The Hawaii Labor Relations Board.
bill.description: Allows the filing of documents with the Hawaii Labor Relations Board electronically or by the original paper document. (HB913 CD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Pass First Reading.
Referred to LAB, FIN, referral sheet 6
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Thursday, 01-31-19 9:30AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Johanson, Eli, Ichiyama, Kitagawa, McKelvey, Quinlan, Yamashita, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 105) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to FIN.
Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Nakamura, Thielen excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Wednesday, 02-27-19 11:00AM in House conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Cullen, Eli, Gates, Hashimoto, Holt, Kitagawa, B. Kobayashi, Matayoshi, Nakamura, Nishimoto, Todd, Wildberger, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) McDermott.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1114), recommending passage on Third Reading.
Passed Third Reading with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) DeCoite excused (1). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 238).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to LCA, JDC.
The committee(s) on LCA has scheduled a public hearing on 03-14-19 3:00PM in conference room 224.

The committee(s) on LCA recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in LCA were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, Ihara, S. Chang, Fevella; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Gabbard.
Reported from LCA (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1349) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referral to JDC.
Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and referred to JDC.
The committee(s) on JDC will hold a public decision making on 03-28-19 9:45AM in conference room 016.

The committee(s) on JDC recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in JDC were as follows: 3 Aye(s): Senator(s) K. Rhoads, Gabbard, Kim; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Wakai, Fevella.
Reported from JDC (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1873) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-09-19.
Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 799) in amended form (SD 2).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 804).
House Conferees Appointed: Eli, Kitagawa Co-Chairs; Matsumoto.
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 808).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Taniguchi Chair; K. Rhoads Co-Chair; Fevella.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 919).
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Tuesday, 04-23-19 3:10PM in conference room 423.

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 3 Ayes: Representative(s) Eli, Kitagawa, Matsumoto; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 2 Aye(s): Senator(s) Taniguchi, K. Rhoads; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Fevella.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 44) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 04-30-19.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 44).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 04-30-19.
Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and none excused (0).
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: none . 0 No(es): none. 0 Excused: none.
Received notice of Final Reading (Sen. Com. No. 968).
Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 883).
Transmitted to Governor.
